title: The tenements in the reconstructed building shall be allotted by landlord/s or Co-operative Housing Societies of existing tenants to the tenants as per list certified by the Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai
clause_text: The tenements in the reconstructed building shall be allotted by landlord/s or Co-operative Housing Societies of existing tenants to the tenants as per list certified by the Municipal Corporation of Greater Mumbai.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
